TopicTitle: Make Sensor Array Computing NC smaller

Articles.Content: Could you please make the SACNC smaller so it fits beneath a lander with the small landing legs attached. Currently, a lander with this design balances on the tip of the NC. The size of the Standard NC would be perfect.
It's designed to be put on the front of an aircraft. Or you could just use bigger legs.

Or add some cubic octagonals to mve the legs down. Not to be harsh, but I don't think Squad should change one of the stock parts just to suit the idiosyncratic design of one user. Part of the appeal of KSP is the creativity you need to design ships with a finite palette of parts. If this lander design is important enough to you, you could always rescale the nose cone yourself, by editing the config file.
